snippet: Confinement in the nation’s toughest, bleakest prison would be sufficient punishment for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, his lawyers argued.
abstract: Defense in trial of Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev makes last effort to spare his life, arguing, among other things, that space remains in high-security penitentiary in Colorado where terrorists and others guilty of heinous crimes are kept.
lead_paragraph: Confinement in the nation’s toughest, bleakest prison would be sufficient punishment for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, his lawyers argued.

headline.main: Ex-Prisons Official Testifies in Boston in Defense Effort to Spare Life of Bomber
headline.print_headline: Ex-Prisons Official Testifies in Boston in Defense Effort to Spare Life of Bomber
